title: Print receipt (Note) - turn on/off
text: 1. Log into POS 2. Click Wrench button 3. Choose Store and Machine, then press Change this machine only 4. Scroll down to Adv. Configuration 5. Scroll down to PrintReceiptDiaglog 6. 1 = Active - 0 = Inactive 7. Scroll down to the bottom and press Save & Close 8. Press Cancel Sale 9. Type Reload in Sales Assistant Field and press green button. Wait for the clock to start running again.
description:
1. 1. Log into POS 

  1. 2. Click Wrench button 

 

  

  1. 3. Choose Store and Machine, then press Change this machine only 

  

 

  

  1. 4. Scroll down to Adv. Configuration 

  

 

  

  1. 5. Scroll down to PrintReceiptDiaglog 

  

 

  1. 6. 1 = Active - 0 = Inactive 

  1. 7. Scroll down to the bottom and press Save & Close 

  

 

  

  1. 8. Press Cancel Sale 

  1. 9. Type Reload in Sales Assistant Field and press green button. Wait for the clock to start running again.

title: Receipt (Note) - correction
text: If a receipt is wrong, it can be 'canceled' by clicking Note Correction under Functions etc, rescanning it and clicking the green button. This only works if the sale has not been paid for with a gift card or a creditnote. If this is the case, they will have to do a return of the item/items instead. if the customer does not have the note/receipt, but knows the date of the sale and the amount, the sale can be located by using Search Note under Shortcuts: Take note of the number XXX-XX-XXXXX and remove the dashes between. Click Close -> Functions -> Note Corrections and add the 11 digits to find and correct the note. If there is only one item on the note, it will be returned. If there are more than one item, you will be asked to choose which item to return (you can select individual items or all of them).
description:
If a receipt is wrong, it can be 'canceled' by clicking Note Correction under Functions etc, rescanning it and clicking the green button.

  

 

  















This only works if the sale has not been paid for with a gift card or a creditnote. If this is the case, they will have to do a return of the item/items instead.


if the customer does not have the note/receipt, but knows the date of the sale and the amount, the sale can be located by using Search Note under Shortcuts:


 

Take note of the number XXX-XX-XXXXX and remove the dashes between. 


Click Close -> Functions -> Note Corrections and add the 11 digits to find and correct the note. 


If there is only one item on the note, it will be returned. If there are more than one item, you will be asked to choose which item to return (you can select individual items or all of them).

title: Receipt (Note) – cancle when paid with Euros (DK)
text: You can't cancle a receipt, if the customer has paid with Euros. Do a return instead, pay back the amount in Dkr. plus the difference.
description:
You can't cancle a receipt, if the customer has paid with Euros. 

  

Do a return instead, pay back the amount in Dkr. plus the difference.

title: Receipt (Note) - print at once or ask
text: POS -> Advanced Configuration -> PrintReceiptDialog -> Set to 1 -> Save -> Reload POS
description: POS -> Advanced Configuration -> PrintReceiptDialog -> Set to 1 -> Save -> Reload POS

title: Receipt (Note) – transfere to BO from POS
text: Type: Export xxxx (receipt nummer) in Shop Assistant Number (where you log into the POS) and click the green button If it is not transfered to BO within 5 minutes, check if it has ended up in quarantine in Backoffice Support Tools:
description:
Type: Export xxxx (receipt nummer) in Shop Assistant Number (where you log into the POS) and click the green button 

  

If it is not transfered to BO within 5 minutes, check if it has ended up in quarantine in Backoffice Support Tools:

title: Receipt lines – hide on customer screen
Receipt number exists in POS but missing in DdD Backoffice
text: Sometime the customer contacts us that they are missing receipt number in backoffice. The first thing is to check if it is present on the pos. One can search for the receipt number with date and can confirm either the receipt is registered in the pos. This can be done by selecting the option search for receipt in pos functions. Now,the next step is to check in backoffice,if the transaction exists there and it can be done by ordering a transaction report for that particular date in DdD backoffice. If it is not present in transaction report then go to POS and write export receipt number in clerk field as shown below. The transaction should be transferred from POS to backoffice with in 5 minutes. In the example below receipt number 33726 is in pos but missing in backoffice. Writing export 33726 in clerk field on pos will transfer it to BackOffice.
description:
Sometime the customer contacts us that they are missing receipt number in backoffice.

The first thing is to check if it is present on the pos.

One can search for the receipt number with date and can confirm either the receipt is registered in the pos.
This can be done by selecting the option search for receipt in pos functions.

Now,the next step is to check in backoffice,if the transaction exists there and it can be done by ordering a transaction report for that particular date in DdD backoffice.

If it is not present in transaction report then go to POS and write export receipt number in clerk field as shown below.

The transaction should be transferred from POS to backoffice with in 5 minutes.

In the example below receipt number 33726 is in pos but missing in backoffice.

Writing export 33726 in clerk field on pos will transfer it to BackOffice.

title: How to scan/return a receipt manually on POS.
text: It is likely that the store’s receipt printer is too old, which could explain why they are unable to scan or process actions on a specific receipt. The store may believe the issue lies with the receipt itself or the barcode scanner. However, the actual problem may arise from the receipt printer. In this case, the printer should be cleaned, or if cleaning doesn’t resolve the issue, it may need to be replaced. For now, the most important step for the store is to manually process the receipt. To do so, the following procedure should be followed for the specific receipt number 026-01-16444, as shown in the example: Log in with the clerk number on the POS system. Enter the receipt number in the format R026+01+16444 and press Enter. Click on the menu (Salg) menu on the POS, and select Return or any other relevant function as required.
description:
It is likely that the store’s receipt printer is too old, which could explain why they are unable to scan or process actions on a specific receipt.

The store may believe the issue lies with the receipt itself or the barcode scanner. However, the actual problem may arise from the receipt printer.

In this case, the printer should be cleaned, or if cleaning doesn’t resolve the issue, it may need to be replaced.

For now, the most important step for the store is to manually process the receipt. To do so, the following procedure should be followed for the specific receipt number 026-01-16444, as shown in the example:




  • Log in with the clerk number on the POS system.
  • Enter the receipt number in the format R026+01+16444 and press Enter.
  • Click on the menu (Salg) menu on the POS, and select Return or any other relevant function as required.
